attributes.action: review Data Protection laws to enable a website setup that could help catch wanted offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There will always be a vast number of persons wanted for crimes that may never be found despite existence of images/photographs that cannot be shared because of current restrictions & potential harm to a successful prosecution. If these photos could be shared via the internet there would be a good chance that many wanted individuals could be identified & located. This could also reduce burdens on police resources, increase the rate of 'solved' crime and give a degree of closure to many persons who may have suffered as a victim of crime.

We have the technology with over a million CCTV cameras operating in the UK now we should be using it more effectively - work smarter, not harder.
